What is a credit hour at LIU?
A credit hour equals 15 hours of teaching per semester. For labs, one credit is 30 hours. A 3-credit course equals 45 hours of attendance. Graduation requires a specific number of credits.

Who is eligible for financial aid at LIU?

Financial aid at LIU is available to qualified students who demonstrate financial need, meet credit enrollment requirements, and maintain academic progress. Students in the School of Pharmacy (SoPH) are not eligible.

Students must maintain a cumulative GPA of at least 70% after 30 credits and pass 67% of attempted credits to continue receiving financial aid.
